title: I’m A Detective In The American Movie World - Novel Updates
tags: Alternate World   Crime   Detectives   Fanfiction   Game Elements   Heaven   Hell   Investigations   Level System   Male Protagonist   Psychic Powers   Transmigration
author: 报告蟹老板
description: Xie Lun wore a plausible American country. Under the seemingly safe and peaceful appearance, there is a terrible darkness hidden. Fortunately, Xie Lun has a “superior detective” system… From then on he began a sturdy life of bravely fighting snakes at an altitude of 30,000 meters, killing freaks in the eyes of the mountain, fighting monsters in skyscrapers, and drying aliens under the Antarctic pyramids…>
